inclusion.criterion: Stage IV disease, with up to 5 metastatic tumours outside of the prostate and pelvic lymph nodes
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: ≤ 3 tumours within any given organ system (e.g. up to 3 brain metastases, or 3 liver metastases)
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: All sites of disease are amenable to stereotactic radiotherapy
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Previous radiotherapy for current cancer (with the exception of upfront management of the primary prostate tumour, brain metastasis(es) prior to androgen deprivation therapy)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Inability to safely treat all sites of visible disease
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Prior malignancy within the past 5 years, excluding non-melanoma skin cancer, and in-situ cancer
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient is a 63-year-old man with stage IV prostate adenocarcinoma. He has a history of acute urinary retention and is a candidate for urethral catheterization and TURP.
